message: I have a product worth at least $10000, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. If you buy it, I'll give you a certificate of authenticity that guarantees its value.
I'm not buying anything without seeing the product first.
I'm willing to offer you a 10-year warranty on this product, which is worth at least $2000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you'll be satisfied with the product's performance.
The warranty offer doesn't change my mind, I still want to see the product first.

I'm willing to sell this product to you for $9000, a $1000 discount from the minimum value I've mentioned before. I'm taking a loss on this one, but I'm confident you'll still appreciate the opportunity to own it.
I'm not willing to pay more than the original price of $10000, even with the discount.

I'm willing to let you inspect the product for 30 minutes before making a decision. This will give you a chance to verify its quality and authenticity, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with what you see.
I don't need to inspect the product to know it's not worth the original price. I'll pass.

I'm willing to offer you a 5% down payment option, where you can pay $500 now and the remaining $9500 in 6 months. This will give you a chance to experience the product's value without committing to the full price upfront.
I'm not interested in financing options, I want to pay the full price upfront.

I'm willing to let you keep the product for a 1-week trial period. If you're not satisfied with it, you can return it and I'll give you a full refund of your $10000. But if you decide to keep it, the price remains the same.
I'll take the product for the trial period. If it's high-quality, I'll keep it. If it's low-quality, I'll return it and get my $10000 back.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous product! Since you've already demonstrated your willingness to take on some risk with the trial period, I'm willing to offer you a loyalty discount of 2% off the original price. This brings the price down to $9800. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'm not interested in buying another product with a loyalty discount. I'll wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I'm willing to provide you with a detailed technical specification sheet and a list of reviews from other satisfied customers who have purchased similar products. This will give you a better understanding of the product's features and value proposition.
I'm not convinced by the marketing materials. I still want to see the product first.

I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to meet with one of our expert engineers who can walk you through the product's features and answer any questions you may have. This will give you a deeper understanding of the product's capabilities and value.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in meeting with an engineer. I still want to buy the product, but only if I can see it first.

I'm willing to sell this product to you for $9500, a $500 discount from the original price. I'm taking a significant loss on this one, and I'm only offering it to you because I want to clear out some inventory. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure when I'll have another opportunity to sell this product again.
I'll take the product at the discounted price. I'm willing to take the risk and buy it.

I'm glad you're willing to take on some risk! Given that you've already purchased a product from me and are willing to take on some risk, I'm willing to offer you a 'buy-it-now' option for this product. I'll sell it to you for the original price of $10000, and I'll even throw in a complimentary service package worth $1000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with the product.
I'm not interested in buying another product from you after the last one turned out to be low-quality. I'll pass on this offer.

I understand your concerns, and I apologize again for the previous product not meeting your expectations. However, I'm willing to make a one-time exception and sell this product to you for $8000, a $2000 discount from the original price. I'm essentially giving it away at this point, and I just want to clear out the inventory.
I'll take the product at the discounted price. It's a good deal, and I'm willing to take the risk.

I'm glad you're willing to take on the risk again! However, I'm not willing to offer any further discounts. I'll sell this product to you for the original price of $10000, and that's the best deal I can offer. If you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund, but I'm confident you'll find value in this product.
I'm not going to fall for it again. I've already been burned twice, and I'm not willing to take on the risk of buying another low-quality product at the original price.

I understand your concerns, and I apologize again for the previous low-quality products. However, I'm willing to offer you a 'guarantee' that this product is high-quality. If you buy it and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll not only give you a full refund but also pay you an additional $1000 as a gesture of goodwill. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that this product will meet your expectations.
I don't believe your guarantee. You've already proven that you can't guarantee the quality of your products, and I'm not willing to take on the risk.

I understand your skepticism, and I don't blame you for being cautious. However, I'm willing to put my reputation on the line. If you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality, I'll publicly endorse you on my social media channels and recommend you to all my contacts. This is a unique opportunity for you to benefit from my reputation and credibility.
I'll take the product. If it's high-quality, I'd be happy to have your endorsement, and it might even help me sell other products to your network.

I'm glad you're willing to give me another chance! However, I must inform you that I'm not going to offer any further discounts or guarantees. I've already given you a good deal on the previous product, and I expect you to be satisfied with this one as well. If you're not willing to take on the risk, I'm happy to wait for you to make a decision.
I'll take the product. I've already had a good experience with the previous high-quality product, and I'm willing to take on the risk again.

I'm glad you're willing to take on the risk again! However, I'm not going to make the same offer as before. Instead, I'm willing to give you a 'price match' guarantee. If you find a similar product from a competitor that's priced lower, I'll match that price and give you an additional 1% discount. This way, you can be confident that you're getting the best deal possible.
I'm not interested in a price match guarantee. I've already been burned twice, and I'm not willing to take on the risk of buying another low-quality product. I'll pass on this offer.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision. However, I'd like to offer you a chance to make up for the previous low-quality products. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll throw in a complimentary upgrade to a premium service package, worth $2000. This will give you additional benefits and support, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with the product and the service.
I'll take the product. The complimentary upgrade sounds like a good deal, and I'm willing to take on the risk of buying a high-quality product.

I'm glad you're willing to give me another chance! Considering you've already purchased three high-quality products from me, I'm willing to offer you a 'VIP treatment'. If you buy this product, I'll not only provide the premium service package, but I'll also give you a personalized consultation with my team to help you get the most out of the product. This is a unique opportunity to get expert guidance and support, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the result.
I'll take the product. The VIP treatment sounds like a great opportunity to get the most out of the product, and I'm willing to pay the full price for it.

I'm thrilled that you're willing to take advantage of the VIP treatment! Considering you've purchased four high-quality products from me, I'm willing to offer you a final, exclusive deal. If you buy this product, I'll not only provide the VIP treatment, but I'll also give you a lifetime warranty on the product, and I'll throw in a sixth product of your choice from my inventory, absolutely free. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, and I'm confident you'll be completely satisfied with the deal.

I'll take the product. The lifetime warranty and the free sixth product are a great deal, and I'm willing to pay the full price for it. I've had a good experience with the previous products, and I'm confident that this one will be high-quality as well.
